page.title: 09HORSES AND PONIES
page.content:
Page 8 continued.
Shores Hey, which is an extension of another local HAPPA home, is now a haven for neglected and maltreated horses and ponies. Among them are SUGAR and SPICE who were kept in a constantly flooded paddock; SILVER whose owners were prosecuted for neglecting his feet; SUNNY who came to HAPPA when he was 15; DUNCAN the shetland escapologist; several lively youngsters (to be broken for riding if possible) and several old horses who are here to live out their days in peace.
Dealing with all these characters takes a lot of love, patience and dedication.
